entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
